income_messages:
From: m*********k@mail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-13 15:12:13
SUBJECT:   Greetings to you!
  Greetings to you!
I am Mrs. Marry Derick. from Atlanta USA, my decision to contact you
is because I have been recently diagnosed with Lungs Cancer and the
doctor said I have less than 6 months to live, since this sudden news
was announced to me, I have been reflecting over my life in the past,
is painful that after over 26 years of peaceful marriage with my late
Husband Mr. Biden Derick , we lost the only child that would have
inherited our numerous wealth.In the past, I have made reasonable
donations to the victims of Earthquake in Haiti and recently to the
same victims in Japan and Thailand, now that my health is gradually
deteriorating, I cannot continue to do all these by myself any more, I
strongly desire to reach out to the poor and needy people, but I would
prefer to continue this with the assistance of a kind person.
I want you to answer the following questions:
1. Are you a God fearing person? 2. If I donate $15.5M (Fifteen
Million five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) to you, will you
be able to utilize it wisely to achieve my heart desire of supporting
poor people around you? 3. Will you open a charity foundation in the
name of my late husband and me?
Would you be able to be help me set up a motherless baby’s home in my
memorial when I am gone, then keep 25% of the money for your effort.
Please reply me directly as soon as possible:
Hope to hear from you soon.
Yours sincerely,
Marry Derick   
From: m*********k@mail.com
To: hl06437@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-13 18:26:41
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
My Dear Miguel, 
 Thanks for your quick response to my message. 
 I will like to know your country of residence, though myself and my husband has  no particular choice of country our primary concern is to help the needy no matter where he or she resides, in the light of the above, I would request to have your full details, example, your ID  be it national ID or national drivers licensee 
 Secondly full assurance from you that you are going to set up a charity/motherless babies home in your area of residence to take care of mostly the needy, because this is the wish of my late husband and I want someone who will carry it out to the later. 
 I want you to know that my health conditions is very bad and as such this project needs a very quick attention, so we must hurry up the process so that I can sign all documents for the transfer of all the money to you before I pass on. 
 Let it be known to you that once we agree on this, there are some other properties which I will hand over to you apart from the money.  I have two buildings here in Atlanta Georgia  and two Toyota Trucks, which I think will go a long way in helping you if taking to your country of residence. 
 As it stands now, I do not go out, my doctor comes to the house for my treatment, and while I wait unto my God for the day He will call me to His Glory. And finally, let me know if you can be able to raise like $1800 or there about to give to the lawyer for his initial take off for his legal works, as I will like him to be answerable to you from the beginning, do not fear as I am making available some funds for you as soon as the documents are completed, I will explain further on this as we go on. And lastly as soon as the agreement is completed I will give you the email address of our attorney so you can connect with him. 
 Yours sincerely, Marry Derick 
 Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2023 at 3:12 PM From: "Miguel" <hl06437@liammacs.email> To: marryderick@mail.com Subject: Re: Greetings to you! 
I am really sorry to hear that and I think I can help with this situation. 
Please just tell me what I can do for you.
Best wishes, 
Miguel
From: m*********k@mail.com
To: hl06437@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-14 17:29:14
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
My Dear Miguel, 
Thanks for your response to my message. 
I will over and over again let you know that theres no risk whatsoever associated with this my dealings with you. Myself and my husband were never involved in any form of criminality/fraud in our life nor were we ever involved in any form of drug dealing. When all these are concluded you will know us better upon the reception our bank will accord you when all has been handed over to you. 
Secondly, if its about the $1800 that i told you send to the lawyer, do not entertain any fear as you will send him the money through bank transfer, my only fear is how fast can you do this, as it will be nice if i witness this things. According to the lawyer, this process should not take more a week before the court issues letter of administration on your name. 
So be confident as there are no risk involved. 
Lastly, please do forward to me your means of IdentificatioN (ID) and your full address. 
Hope to hear from you soon. 
Yours sincerely, 
Marry Derick 
 Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2023 at 7:12 PM From: "Miguel" <hl06437@liammacs.email> To: marryderick@mail.com Subject: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP 
I have read what you wrote and I just want to be sure the risks.
Best wishes, 
Miguel
From: m*********k@mail.com
To: hl06437@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-14 17:29:34
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
My Dear Miguel, 
Thanks for your response to my message. 
I will over and over again let you know that theres no risk whatsoever associated with this my dealings with you. Myself and my husband were never involved in any form of criminality/fraud in our life nor were we ever involved in any form of drug dealing. When all these are concluded you will know us better upon the reception our bank will accord you when all has been handed over to you. 
Secondly, if its about the $1800 that i told you send to the lawyer, do not entertain any fear as you will send him the money through bank transfer, my only fear is how fast can you do this, as it will be nice if i witness this things. According to the lawyer, this process should not take more a week before the court issues letter of administration on your name. 
So be confident as there are no risk involved. 
Lastly, please do forward to me your means of IdentificatioN (ID) and your full address. 
Hope to hear from you soon. 
Yours sincerely, 
Marry Derick 
 Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2023 at 7:12 PM From: "Miguel" <hl06437@liammacs.email> To: marryderick@mail.com Subject: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP 
I have read what you wrote and I just want to be sure the risks.
Best wishes, 
Miguel
From: m*********k@mail.com
To: hl06437@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 15:41:36
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP/ SEE ATTACHED MY PIC
My dear Miguel, 
 Thanks for your email message. I will like to let you know that I do not have all the time to write you daily because of my health condition, I am critically down, about two days ago, I was on life support and couldn’t attend to your message. Please I have told you that money in question is the life earnings of myself and that of my late husband, but because we have no child that’s why am looking for someone like you to inherit our fortune. Since I have given you that opportunity, try and use of it and fast too. 
 I have given my bank instructions on what to do, though verbally, until its documentations gets to them, they will do nothing . Please contact the lawyer as soon as possible for him to start the process before anything happens to me. I want this things to happen very fast because I do not want the lawyer to handle my buildings because he will charge me more, that’s why I want to hand the documents of my building directly to you, so if you want change of ownership, you can do it with your preferred attorney. 
 I may not have this chance to write in details anymore, or even write at all. There is no risk involved whatsoever. 
 Attached hereunder is the picture of myself in oxygen support , bellow is the contact of my lawyer Barrister J. Williams Email:  barristerwilliams200@consultant.com 
 Hope to hear from you soon. 
 Yours sincerely, 
 Marry Derick 
 Sent: Friday, April 14, 2023 at 7:24 PM From: "Miguel" <hl06437@liammacs.email> To: marryderick@mail.com Subject: Re: Greetings to you!/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP 
I am really keen to cooperate with you. But is there any potential risks that could effect your company and me?
Best wishes, 
Miguel
